arStrings.szText:
For the next {c_number}{s1}{/c} minutes:
{icon:bullet}Enemies routinely drop additional {c_materials}Gem Fragments{/c} and occasionally drop {c_rune}Runes{/c}.
{icon:bullet}Kills accumulate Reputation with the {c_yellow}Zakarum Remnants{/c}.
{icon:bullet}You gain {c_number}15%{/c} increased Experience.
You may only have one Seething Opal active at a time. Drops improve with current Difficulty Level and cannot appear from enemies that do not normally drop items.
